Code for constructing Master File for user

```{r, echo = TRUE, comment = NA}
title <- paste0("---\n", "title: 'Course Files'\n", "output:\n", "  html_document:\n", "    toc: true\n", "    toc_depth: 4\n", "    toc_float:\n", "      collapsed: false\n", "      smooth_scroll: true\n", "  pdf_document:\n", "    toc: yes\n", "    toc_depth: 4\n", "    number_sections: yes\n", "    df_print: kable\n", "---\n")
rmd <- list.files(path = "Rmd_Output", pattern = '*.Rmd', recursive = TRUE, include.dirs = FALSE)
if (length(rmd) != 0) {
  chunks <- paste0("```{r child = 'Rmd_Output/", rmd, "'}\n```\n")
  cat(title, chunks, file = "Rmd_Master_File.Rmd", sep = '\n')
}
if (length(rmd) == 0) {
  chunks <- paste0("No Files Selected. Please select some files.")
  cat(title, chunks, file = "Rmd_Master_File.Rmd", sep = '\n')
}
```
